title: Sri Maha Bodhi sapling to be planted in Buddhagaya to mark 2600th Sambuddha Jayanthi
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) A sapling of the Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi in Anuradhapura was brought to Temple Trees which is ready to be send to India on Monday 14 February. The sapling to be taken to India for planting at Buddhagaya to mark the 2600th Sambuddha Jayanthi celebrations…
